text:
APSA Formal Theory Section Awards
Get your nominations (self-nominations encouraged) by MARCH 1. Send nominations straight to the committee.
Then, go back to the train station and take a Rochefort 10. 😂
Nothing compares with an Orval or, even better, a Rochefort 10. 🍻

In a new paper, we investigate the claim made by advocates of Instant Runoff Voting (Ranked Choice Voting) that it prevents strategic voting and induces people to vote sincerely. More generally, we investigate how complexity affects voters’ behavior. Link: papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers....

Polisky folks! 2nd Annual EPOVB conference will be in Tallahassee at FSU Feb. 29 through March 2 (an amazing time of year time to be in Tallahassee)

See below for details. Funding available for grad student travel. Submissions here: fsu.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_...

For #EconSky JM candidates: We're hiring an open-rank open-field professor of Economics @@1863402 

I am on the hiring committee this year and will be happy to answer questions. Please pass along to JMCs you know!

econjobmarket.org/positions/9856
